backend/main.mo: Defines core backend types for sessions, documents, channels, messages, images, files, and storage mixins; no logic beyond type declarations is shown.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented UI scale–related features with associated source files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/docs/regression-test-plan-playe: Markdown regression test plan covering image and file upload flows for player and session documents, including error and regression checks.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark theme values, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point bootstrapping theme mode early and loading the React application root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app container handling authentication, profile setup, session restoration, routing, and global providers with loading and logout logic.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: React error boundary that displays an error alert and offers reload or clearing local data when uncaught errors occur.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChannelChat: Chat UI for a channel with message sending, roll command handling, image upload, reply support, and auto‑scrolling.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: Renders a single chat message with avatar, images, reply indicators, roll formatting, and long‑press detection.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCom: Displays document comments with add/delete actions, loading states, and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCon: Parses document content for file markers and renders text, inline images, or downloadable file blocks.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentEdi: Full document editor with saving, preview toggle, file uploads, image insertion, and unsaved‑changes tracking.
frontend/src/components/docs/ImageUpload: Dialog component for selecting, validating, titling, and uploading an image with error handling.
frontend/src/components/docs/PlayerDocum: Editor view for player documents supporting editing, saving, previewing, file uploads, and image insertion.
frontend/src/components/profile/Avatar.t: Avatar component showing a user image or generated initials with size options and fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Profile picture manager allowing upload, validation, progress tracking, and removal of user images.
frontend/src/components/session/ChannelM: Dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting session channels with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/session/Document: Dialogs for creating, renaming, locking, and deleting documents, including content input and error handling.
frontend/src/components/session/HostSess: UI component that lets a session host export or import session data, handling file parsing, confirmation, and errors.
frontend/src/components/session/MembersC: Dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting members' channels with form handling and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/session/PlayerDo: Components for creating player documents and managing individual document actions like renaming, deleting, and visibility changes.
Dialog for listing player documents, allowing selection, creation, and viewing ownership or privacy status.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionD: Dialog for listing, creating, renaming, and deleting session-wide documents with selection and error handling.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionS: Sidebar component showing channels, member channels, and UI controls with collapse and creation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/settings/PreLobb: Settings screen for theme, nickname, background image, and template import/reset before entering a lobby.
frontend/src/components/settings/UiScale: Popover control for adjusting UI scale with slider and preset buttons.
frontend/src/config/polling.ts: Defines polling intervals for messages, lists, session data, and document content.
Context provider for loading, saving, updating, and resetting user preferences with theme and UI scale effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and maintains the backend actor tied to identity and invalidates related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentComments.t: Hooks for listing, adding, updating, and deleting document comments using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentFiles.ts: Hooks for listing document files, fetching file references, and uploading files with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentImages.ts: Hooks for listing images and adding images to documents or player documents with query updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and tracking login status.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerDocuments.ts: React-query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, updating, deleting, and modifying visibility of player documents via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePolling.ts: Simple hook that runs a callback on an interval when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferences.ts: Re-exports the usePreferences hook from the preferences context for compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionData.ts: React-query hooks to load session data, channels, members’ channels, and messages with polling plus mutations for managing member channels.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionDocuments.t: React-query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, renaming, editing, and deleting session documents.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDisplayName.ts: Fetches a user's display name with fallback formatting for principals when unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React-query hooks for retrieving and modifying user profiles, including saving profile data and removing profile pictures.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining theming, dark mode, UI scaling, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/clearLocalAppData.ts: Clears specific localStorage keys and all sessionStorage entries with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/documentFileMarkers.ts: Utility functions for creating, parsing, inserting, and removing file marker tags in document content.
frontend/src/lib/documentImageMarkers.ts: Utility functions for creating, parsing, inserting, and removing image marker tags in document content.
frontend/src/lib/preferencesStorage.ts: Manages user preference storage in localStorage with defaults and clamped UI scale.
frontend/src/lib/rollCommand.ts: Validates simple dice roll command patterns and returns basic validity info.
frontend/src/lib/sessionExportFile.ts: Creates, downloads, and parses session export JSON files with version checking.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Stores and retrieves session context data in localStorage, including sessionId and user info.
Saves, loads, clears, and validates session templates stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into human‑readable date or time strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: UI logic for hosting or joining sessions, loading templates, and handling authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/SessionPage.tsx: Manages session view state, loading channels and documents, and switching between chat and editors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines current project metadata, existing UI scale feature entries, and a pending new feature request for expanding the UI scale range. Contains project configuration fields such as versioning, issues, and architectural notes.
